attributes.action: Andrea Leadsom MP for Prime Minister. To implement a pro brexit from the eu.
attributes.additional_details: Wholly unacceptable and undemocratic to have a working government who mainly voted to remain in the eu. Conflict of interest to the majority of referendum voters.
attributes.background:
Andrea Leadsom for PM.
Pro brexit Government to implement the leaving of the eu. 
Democratically Uphold the majority of Voters wishes in leaving the eu.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
